title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 158.3 - Construction and material
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 158.3 - Construction and material

State Regulations
(a) The cover, tarpaulin or other device shall be of such material, design and construction to
contain the substance being transported without permitting loss of the
substance being transported through the cover, tarpaulin or device
itself. (b) A cover, tarpaulin or
other device that is, or has become, torn or ruptured, so as to not contain the
substance being transported, or that is, or has become, insecurely fastened to
the degree that loss of the substance occurs, shall be considered as failing to
meet the requirements of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
158.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
